items.name: Pandemonium Track
implicitMods: 33% increased Effect of the Buff granted by your Lightning Golems

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that hits enemies.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have +148% to Critical Strike Multiplier
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: 64% reduced Effect of Shock on you during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Perandus Signet
explicitMods: 2% increased Intelligence for each Unique Item Equipped
3% chance for Slain monsters to drop an additional Scroll of Wisdom
flavourText: "Our warehouses are bursting. Our vaults are full.
But our minds are still hungry."
- Medici Perandus, Prefect to the Treasury

items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.typeLine: Scholar's Divine Life Flask of Allaying
explicitMods:
Grants Immunity to Bleeding for 14 seconds if used while Bleeding
Grants Immunity to Corrupted Blood for 14 seconds if used while affected by Corrupted Blood
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.typeLine: Bountiful Jade Flask of the Petrel
explicitMods: 38% reduced Effect of Curses on you during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Chitus' Apex
flavourText: "It takes true strength to hold power,
and my grip grows tighter by the day."

items.name: Maloney's Mechanism
explicitMods: Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Attack with a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown
5% chance to Blind Enemies on Hit with Attacks
flavourText: a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel.
I will see them again, but not until my work is done.
